Class VimeoVideosRequest

Description
Description | Methods (details) Constants (details)

Vimeo Videos request handler class

Implements all API queries in the vimeo.videos.* category

Located in /lib/class.vimeo.php (line 1813)

Methods
Description | Constants (details) Methods (details)
addTags (line 2275)

Add specified tags to the video, this does not replace any tags.

Tags should be comma separated lists.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosAddTagsResponse addTags (integer $iVideoID, mixed $mTags)
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
  • mixed $mTags: Array with tags or Comma separated list of tags ("lions, tigers, bears")
checkUploadStatus (line 2173)

Check the status of an upload started via the API

This is how you get the video_id of a clip uploaded from the API If you never call this to check in, we assume it was abandoned and don't process it

  • access: public
VimeoVideosCheckUploadStatusResponse checkUploadStatus (string $sTicket)
  • string $sTicket: The ticket number of the upload
clearTags (line 2314)

Remove ALL of the tags from the video

  • access: public
VimeoVideosClearTags clearTags (integer $iVideoID)
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
delete (line 2202)

Delete a video

The authenticated user must own the video and have granted delete permission

  • access: public
VimeoVideosDeleteResponse delete (integer $iVideoID)
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
doUpload (line 2189)

Simple video upload

  • access: public
VimeoVideosCheckUploadStatusResponse doUpload (string $sFilename, [string $sTicket = false])
  • string $sFilename: Absolute path to file
  • string $sTicket: Existing ticket or false to generate a new one
getAppearsInList (line 1940)

This gets a list of videos that the specified user appears in.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetAppearsInListResponse getAppearsInList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getContactsLikeList (line 2111)

Get a list of videos that the specified users contacts like.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetContactsLikeListResponse getContactsLikeList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getContactsList (line 2078)

Get a list of videos made by the contacts of a specific user.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetContactsListResponse getContactsList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getInfo (line 2142)

Get all kinds of information about a photo.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public

  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID

Get a list of videos that the specified user likes.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public

  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getList (line 1874)

This gets a list of videos for the specified user.

This is the functionality of "My Videos" or "Ted's Videos." At the moment, this is the same list as vimeo.videos.getAppearsInList. If you need uploaded or appears in, those are available too.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetListResponse getList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getListByTag (line 2008)

This gets a list of videos by tag

If you specify a user_id, we'll only get video uploaded by that user with the specified tag. If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetListByTagResponse getListByTag (string $sTag, [integer $iUserID = false], [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • string $sTag: A single tag: "cat" "new york" "cheese"
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getSubscriptionsList (line 1973)

This gets a list of subscribed videos for a particular user.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetSubscriptionsListResponse getSubscriptionsList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getUploadedList (line 1907)

This gets a list of videos uploaded by the specified user.

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetUploadedListResponse getUploadedList (integer $iUserID, [integer $iPage = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • integer $iPage: Which page to show.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: How many results per page?
getUploadTicket (line 2159)

Generate a new upload Ticket.

You'll need to pass this to the uploader. It's only good for one upload, only good for one user.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosGetUploadTicketResponse getUploadTicket ()
removeTag (line 2298)

Remove specified tag from the video.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosRemoveTagResponse removeTag (integer $iVideoID, integer $iTagID)
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
  • integer $iTagID: Tag ID, this should be a tag id returned by vimeo.videos.getInfo
search (line 1834)

Search videos!

If the calling user is logged in, this will return information that calling user has access to (including private videos). If the calling user is not authenticated, this will only return public information, or a permission denied error if none is available.

  • access: public
VimeoVideosSearchResponse search (string $sQuery, [integer $iUserID = false], [boolean $bContactsOnly = false], [integer $iItemsPerPage = false])
  • string $sQuery: Search query
  • integer $iUserID: User ID, this can be the ID number (151542) or the username (ted)
  • boolean $bContactsOnly: If TRUE, we'll only search the users contacts. If this is set, you must specifiy a User ID. Otherwise it will be ignored without error.
  • integer $iItemsPerPage: ow many results per page?
setCaption (line 2235)

Set a new caption for a video (overwrites previous caption)

  • access: public
VimeoVideosSetCaptionResponse setCaption (integer $iVideoID, string $sVideoCaption)
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
  • string $sVideoCaption: Caption
setFavorite (line 2252)

  • access: public
VimeoVideosSetFavoriteResponse setFavorite (integer $iVideoID, [boolean $bFavorite = true])
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
  • boolean $bFavorite: TRUE to favorite, FALSE to return to normal
setPrivacy (line 2330)

Set the privacy of the video

  • access: public
void setPrivacy (integer $iVideoID, integer $ePrivacy, [mixed $mUsers = array()])
  • integer $iVideoID: Video ID
  • integer $ePrivacy: Privacy enum see VimeoVideosRequest::PRIVACY_*
  • mixed $mUsers: Array or comma separated list of users who can view the video. PRIVACY_USERS must be set.
